issue.title: [Archery] Allow comment bot command to be at the beginning of any line
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-12720](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-12720). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Follow on to ARROW-12653. 

There are a few complexities that we should decide:

- Should we require the bot `@` mention be at the beginning of the line?
- Should we do any other validation (e.g. inside of a code block)?
